title: For Sale:  T206 Southern Leaguer - George Manion (PSA 1)

posts.post_title: For Sale:  T206 Southern Leaguer - George Manion (PSA 1)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I currently have the following T206s SLers for sale (front and back scans provided below).  First come, first serve.  All prices include delivery.  Paypal fine, with no additional surcharge.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any! 

T206 George Manion, PSA 1 - $55

T206 Harry Lentz (Sentz), PSA 2 - **SOLD, via eBay**
T206 J. Ross Helm, PSA 1 **SOLD, thanks Dave**
T206 George Paige (one of the tougher SLers), PSA 1 **SOLD, thanks Henry**
T206 Gordon Hickman, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Bock Hooker, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Dutch Jordan, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Marc**
T206 William Otey, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Danny**
T206 Carlos Smith, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Rick**

In addition to being for sale, I would also consider trading any of the above for a T206 Foster (please just email me a scan with a proposed trade).  Cash could always be added, including by me, to even a trade out.

Regards,
Adam
aamoniz@yahoo.com
